import { Card, CardHeader, CardContent, Avatar, Divider, Typography, Button } from "@material-ui/core" import bankStyle from '../bankStyle' const BanksCard =(props)=>{ const classes = bankStyle() const accounts = props.bank.accounts const banks = props.bank return {bank.name.charAt(0)}} /> { accounts.length>0 ? (
{`Account number: ${accounts[0].account_number}`}
) : (
Account is not set yet ):
) } } export default BanksCard
